content: Grahame Grieve renamed stream Documents Templates and Rules (DTR) to Da Vinci DTR

CRD and DTR endpoints

There is a live instance of the CRD RI running on LogicaHealth:
https://davinci-crd.logicahealth.org/stu3/cds-services

There is a live instance of the DTR RI running on LogicaHealth:
https://davinci-dtr.logicahealth.org/
Note that the posted CRD link is the base url which will return the services that CRD supports, it does not accept requests.
